properties.description: Open to all for a meal, conversation and company This space on a Monday provides a two course meal (£5 per person) which is followed by our CAMEO (Come And Meet Each Other) club for £1 pp. This club is interactive with activities such as craft, games, films etc each week where refreshments are served.

properties.description: When: Monday - Friday 9am - 12pmPlease come in from the cold between 9am - midday Monday to Friday From Monday 19th December the Sports Club will be opening from 9am to 12 noon Monday to Friday for local people to come in and read their paper and have a chat in the warm. We will be offering tea and coffee subject to demand.
